callerReference.description: Internal value used by CloudFront to allow future updates to the public key configuration.

comment.description: An optional comment about the public key.

encodedKey.description: The encoded public key that you want to add to CloudFront to use with features like field-level encryption.

etag.description: The current version of the public key. For example: `E2QWRUHAPOMQZL`.

name.description: The name for the public key. By default generated by this provider.

namePrefix.description:
The name for the public key. Conflicts with `name`.

**NOTE:** When setting `encoded_key` value, there needs a newline at the end of string. Otherwise, multiple runs of pulumi will want to recreate the `aws.cloudfront.PublicKey` resource.
